mapper.select: select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 2001 and year_birth >= 1992
select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 1991 and year_birth >= 1981
select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 1979 and year_birth >= 1971
select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 1970 and year_birth >= 1961
select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 1980 and year_birth >= 1970
select * from member,myaccomk where member.USER_ID = myaccomk.USER_ID and year_birth <= 1980 and year_birth >= 1970

select * from (select home_no,home_name,home_address,myaccomk.HOME_TYPE, myaccomk.HOME_LOCAL,myaccomk.HOME_CONTENT, count(*) from myaccomk group by home_no,home_name,home_address,myaccomk.HOME_TYPE, myaccomk.HOME_LOCAL,myaccomk.HOME_CONTENT) where rownum <= 10
